Calculate Required Sample Size per Stratum for Detecting RMST Difference

rmst_sample_size.Rd

Calculate sample sizes needed per stratum to detect a specified RMST effect size with given alpha and power, using stratified survival data.

Usage

rmst_sample_size(
  data,
  tau,
  effect_size,
  alpha = 0.05,
  power = 0.8,
  n_per_stratum = NULL
)

Arguments

data

Data frame with columns: time, status, stratum (factor).

tau

Numeric truncation time for RMST calculation.

effect_size

Numeric expected difference in RMST between groups.

alpha

Numeric Type I error rate (default 0.05).

power

Numeric desired power (default 0.8).

n_per_stratum

Optional numeric vector of current sample sizes per stratum (to estimate variance).

Value

Numeric vector of required sample sizes per stratum.
